text:
[Verse]
Under the stormy skies
We feel the rhythm rise
Raindrops fall on us
A moment we trust

[Verse 2]
Feet splash in puddles bright
Lightening up the night
Every heartbeat syncs
With every step we sink

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Losing all our pain
Every drop a song
Together we belong

[Verse 3]
No umbrellas here
We embrace the cheer
Water all around
To this beat we're bound

[Verse 4]
Clouds can never hide
What we feel inside
Love shines through the storm
Keeping our hearts warm

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Losing all our pain
Every drop a song
Together we belong
title: Dancing in the Rain
